definition: Assumption of the Virgin Mary (Christian festival on 15th August)
Goddess peak (Nepalese: Sagarmatha, Sky Goddess)/refers to Mt Chomolungma or Qomolangma (Tibetan), Chinese 珠穆朗瑪峰|珠穆朗玛峰/Mt Everest

sentences.chinese: 克里姆林宮的聖母領報大教堂。

sentences.english: Tsheri tried to conquer Everest last year but failed.
sentences.chinese: 伽利去年就試過要征服聖母峯，不過沒有成功。

sentences.english: His greatest works are the School of Athens and the Sistine Madonna.
sentences.chinese: 他最偉大的作品是《雅典學院》和《西斯廷聖母像》。

sentences.english: When she was arrested at Notre Dame last month, he was right beside her.
sentences.chinese: 當她上個月在聖母大學被捕後，特里一直陪伴着她。

sentences.english: The Cathedral of Notre Dame in Amiens looms in the early morning mist.
sentences.chinese: 亞眠的巴黎聖母院在晨霧中若隱若現。

sentences.english: Everest Snowman foundling, blocked septic tanks.
sentences.chinese: 聖母峯雪人的棄嬰，化糞池堵塞的兇手。

sentences.english: Last night I dreamed of traveling to Paris and seeing Notre-Dame de Paris.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚我夢遊巴黎，在夢中我看到了巴黎聖母院。

sentences.english: Yes, master, but how are we to get into Notre-Dame?
sentences.chinese: 對呀，老師。可是我們怎樣進聖母院裏去呢？

sentences.english: Notre-Dame de Paris is, in particular, a curious specimen of this variety.
sentences.chinese: 巴黎聖母院尤其是這種變化的一個奇特的標本。

sentences.english: Before that, they were the Mother's Teats, or just the Teats.
sentences.chinese: 在此之前它們被稱爲聖母的雙乳，或者就是雙乳峯。

sentences.english: Shaping Our Lady of the center of the whole painting.
sentences.chinese: 聖母地塑造是全畫地中間。

sentences.english: This is how the CICM presence in Singapore started.
sentences.chinese: 這是如何開始在新加坡聖母聖心會的存在。

sentences.english: Joy, joy, for Christ is born, The Babe, the Son of Mary.
sentences.chinese: 爲耶穌基督的誕生而喜悅，聖母瑪麗之子。

sentences.english: A small party was planning to ascend Mt. Everest.
sentences.chinese: 一小隊人在計畫攀登聖母峯。

sentences.english: That's going to be a harder challenge than climbing Everest.
sentences.chinese: 這個挑戰比攀登聖母峯更加困難。

sentences.english: Many critics have praised Pieta Brown.
sentences.chinese: 許多評論家都稱讚聖母憐子圖布朗。

definition: feudal term of praise for ruler, king or emperor/general term for saint in former times/term for God during the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom 太平天國|太平天国/Holy Spirit (in Christian Trinity)
archaic variant of 蘇|苏[su1]/to revive
Jehovah (biblical name for God, Hebrew: YHWH)/compare Yahweh 雅威[Ya3 wei1] and God 上帝[Shang4 di4]
saint/sage/refers to Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3]/the current reigning Emperor
